Name: Cambrian Dawn
About the game: Welcome to the Cambrian Dawn! Cambrian Dawn features a plethora of colorful and well researched species: from Parvibellus to Omnidens, there are many characters to choose from. Hunt, Swim, and Explore through the shallows, venture into the abyss, or journey to the grand sponge reefs where the fight for survival is always present! Cambrian Dawn features a unique take on the prehistoric genre with a focus on the Cambrian Period of earth's history. Explore the Cambrian like never before! FEATURES: Casual growth system. Basic combat system. Private matches with the ability to invite friends via Steam. Active support on the forums. Living Encyclopedia with narrated species entries. Trailer Music: Enter the Maze by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. NOTICE: Contains bright/flashing colors on some creatures, as well as mild blood.
